indicator_name: Production status of the new Metropolitan Urban-Planning Plan

barcelona_target: By 2021, have a new Metropolitan Urban-Planning Master Plan

target_line_2030: Foster the processing of the Metropolitan Urban-Planning Plan, with the perspective of achieving its definitive approval during the 2019-2023 term of office. Target value 2021: The Metropolitan Urban-Planning Plan definitively approved and in force
target_name: Provide support for positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, suburban and rural areas, strengthening the planning of national and regional development
